description: The Ferris Wiggum web UI is currently designed for desktop viewports. As the primary use case is mobile browser usage (replacing the need for an IDE), all views must be optimized for screens as narrow as 390px with touch-friendly interactions and mobile navigation patterns.

stories.title: Add Mobile Breakpoint CSS Variables
stories.description: As a** developer I want** standardized mobile breakpoint variables in the CSS So that** all components use consistent responsive behavior

stories.title: Create Bottom Tab Bar Component
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** a bottom tab bar for navigation So that** I can easily reach navigation with my thumb
acceptance_criteria: Tabs: Dashboard, New Session, Settings (if applicable)
Fixed to bottom of viewport on mobile

stories.title: Mobile-Responsive Session List
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the session list to display as stacked cards So that** I can browse sessions on a narrow screen
acceptance_criteria: Session cards stack vertically at full width on mobile
Session title, status, and date visible without truncation

stories.title: Simplify File Picker for Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** a simple single-column file browser So that** I can select a project folder without complex UI
acceptance_criteria: Remove sidebar shortcuts panel on mobile; show only browse list
Breadcrumb path displayed at top (scrollable if needed)
Folders and files in single column with icons
"Select" button fixed at bottom when folder is highlighted
Verify folder selection state updates correctly when navigating

stories.title: PRD Editor as Structured Form
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the PRD editor to be a form with labeled sections So that** I can fill in PRD fields without editing raw markdown
acceptance_criteria: Create `PrdForm` component with separate textareas for:
Form serializes to/from markdown PRD format
Textareas auto-expand or have reasonable min-height

stories.title: Mobile New Session View Layout
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the new session form to flow vertically So that** I can create a session on my phone
acceptance_criteria: File picker and PRD form stack vertically (not side-by-side)
Clear step indication (1. Select folder → 2. Define PRD)

stories.title: Mobile Activity Log Layout
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the activity log to be readable on narrow screens So that** I can monitor session progress
acceptance_criteria: Log entries stack vertically with full-width
Long file paths truncated with ellipsis or wrapped
Expandable detail view for individual entries

stories.title: Mobile Story Progress Display
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to see user story progress clearly So that** I know what's completed and what's next
acceptance_criteria: Stories displayed as vertical list (not grid)

stories.title: Mobile Token Meter
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to see token usage without it taking too much space So that** I can monitor costs while focusing on content
acceptance_criteria: Compact horizontal bar or circular progress indicator
Positioned in header or collapsible panel (not always visible)

stories.title: Mobile Guardrails Panel
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** guardrails settings accessible but not in the way So that** I can configure them when needed
acceptance_criteria: Guardrails collapsed by default on mobile
Expandable accordion or modal for settings
Toggle switches sized for touch (44px min)

stories.title: Mobile Session Dashboard Layout
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the session view to organize panels vertically So that** I can scroll through session details naturally
acceptance_criteria: Panels stack: Story Progress → Activity Log → Token Meter → Guardrails
Collapsible sections to reduce scroll length
Sticky header with session name and status

stories.title: Mobile Branch Selector
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** to select git branches easily So that** I can target the right branch for my session
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown or bottom sheet for branch selection
Search/filter branches if list is long

stories.title: Hide Desktop Navigation on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the desktop header/sidebar hidden So that** screen space is maximized for content

stories.title: Touch-Friendly Form Inputs
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** all form inputs sized for touch So that** I can tap accurately without frustration
acceptance_criteria: Input fields minimum 44px height with adequate padding
Adequate spacing between interactive elements (8px minimum)

stories.title: Responsive Typography Scale
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** text sized appropriately for mobile reading So that** content is readable without zooming
acceptance_criteria: Body text minimum 16px on mobile (prevents iOS zoom on focus)
